attributes.action: Decreasing the high rise cost in petrol, it's unaffordable.
attributes.additional_details: The government is responsible for the British citizens, and they have the power to decrease the petrol prices. Families and working class people are struggling with the high rise living costs, and this cannot continue. This is an outrage and our government needs to step in and take action, wages are not increasing. However everything else is increasing, eventually we will not be able to survive financially.
attributes.background: The government needs to address this high rise cost in petrol/diesel. With the high cost of living in London. This is very unaffordable for families on low incomes and working class people. We need the petrol costs to be decreased immediately, as this is a massive concern to the public.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
